articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Jordan-King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Jordan-King
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Abdullah II, King of Jordan, on his 48th birthday.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the king good health and happiness and the friendly Jordanian people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Sri Lanka President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Sri Lanka President
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Mahinda Rajapaksa, on his reelection as president of Sri Lanka.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, Kim in the message wished the president of Sri Lanka success in his responsible work for national reconciliation and unity and development of the country.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulates Bulgarian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Congratulates Bulgarian FM
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Nickolay Mladenov on his appointment as foreign minister of Bulgaria.
					 The message wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulates Ecuadorian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Congratulates Ecuadorian FM
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Ricardo Patino on his appointment as foreign minister of Ecuador.
					 Expressing belief that the process of establishing diplomatic relations between the two countries would be concluded at an early date to accelerate the development of the bilateral relations, the message wished him great success in his new job.

articles.title: Reception Given by Vietnamese Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Vietnamese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Le Van Cu, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception on Thursday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Vietnam.
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Myong San, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Vietnamese embassy.
					
					 Le Van Cu said in his speech made at the reception that it is the consistent stand of the party, government and people of Vietnam to value the friendly and cooperative relations with the party, government and people of the fraternal DPRK.
					
					 He stressed that the Vietnamese party, government and people always support the sustained efforts of the party, government and people of the DPRK for achieving the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater success in their efforts to build a powerful and prosperous, socialist country, rallied as one in mind under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun in his speech expressed the will to strive with the Vietnamese comrades to further strengthen the ties of friendship and cooperation in all spheres of politics, economy and culture.
					
					 He wished the Vietnamese government and people greater progress and prosperity in their work for socialist construction and regional peace and stability.

articles.title: 60 years of DPRK-Vietnam Diplomatic Ties Marked in hanoi
articles.content:
60 years of DPRK-Vietnam Diplomatic Ties Marked in hanoi
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition marking the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Vietnam was held in the Ho Chi Minh Museum in Hanoi on Jan. 22.
					 Displayed in the venue were photos on external activities conducted by President Kim Il Sung with President Ho Chi Minh and those done by General Secretary Kim Jong Il with General Secretary Nong Duc Manh as well as pictures on the immortal Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 The curator of the Museum said that the friendly and cooperative relations between Vietnam and the DPRK have steadily grown stronger since the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries on Jan. 31, 1950, adding that the exhibition would help the Vietnamese people have a good understanding of the history of the development of the bilateral relations and achievements made by the Korean people in the defence of the country and socialist construction. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the exhibition would contribute to boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the parties, governments and peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Economic Upswing Effected
articles.content:
Economic Upswing Effected
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Korean service personnel and people are now full of determination to make tremendous achievements in the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Last year witnessed that the country's economy including heavy industry further grew through the campaigns for a great upsurge, providing a solid foundation for the building of a strong economy.
					
					 During the 150 and 100-day campaigns, a sharp increase of production was gained in main sectors of the national economy, all industrial sectors activated and monumental production bases representing the Songun era built in many parts of the country.
					
					 The "Huichon Speed," a new Chollima speed, strikingly demonstrated how powerful the moral strength of the Korean people was when they were turning out in efforts to bring about a great upsurge in response to the torch kindled by General Secretary Kim Jong Il at the Chollima Steel Complex (Kangson), home of the Chollima movement.
					
					 The great successes made last year show that the DPRK is on the track of upturn and the day of opening the gate to a thriving nation is getting nearer.
					
					 The Korean people are carrying forward the tradition of constant innovation, unceasing progress by accelerating the advance speed in response to the call made by the workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex this year as they did last year, inspired by the appeal of those of Kangson.
					
					 Workers of light industry are making every possible effort to make their products better so that consumers can feel homemade goods are the best, while peasants are devoting themselves to increasing the grain output.
					
					 Workers of metal, electric power, coal mining and machine-building industries and railway transport are also in high spirits to contribute to the improvement of the people's living standard with increased production and transport this year.
					
					 All the leading economic officials and workers are striving hard to overtake and outstrip advanced countries in all sectors.

articles.title: Validity of Songun-based Line Proved in Practice
articles.content:
Validity of Songun-based Line Proved in Practice
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il published a famous work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" on January 29, Juche 92 (2003).
					He, in the work, elucidates the essence, characteristics, revolutionary nature, justness and inexhaustible vitality of the Songun-based revolutionary leadership, Songun politics, of the Workers' Party of Korea. He also indicates tasks and ways for putting the revolutionary cause of Juche on a higher stage under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The work gives a profound truth that the WPK's Songun politics is an invincible one and a treasured sword of the revolution and construction in the present era.
					
					 In a bid to stifle the Democratic People's Republic of Korea persistently pursuing independence and socialism, the imperialists had escalated pressure and sanctions against it in all spheres around the advent of the 21st century, while intensifying preparations for a military attack on it.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, with a scientific analysis of the international circumstances of the Korean revolution and international developments, has pursued Songun politics to lead the DPRK to victory, breaking through difficulties.
					
					 The WPK has increased the national power in every way by giving priority to the military affairs and pushed ahead with the overall socialist construction with the People's Army as the pivot force. Thanks to this Songun politics of the WPK, a strong fortress of anti-imperialist military front has been formed and a solid foundation for the completion of the cause of socialism has been provided.
					
					 In particular, a dramatic change has been made in the Korean people's effort for building a thriving nation and a heyday of prosperity, unprecedented in the history of the nation, has come. The fact verifies that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics, is the best revolutionary line and political mode in the present era.

articles.title: US Urged to Make Decision to Conclude Peace Treaty
articles.content:
US Urged to Make Decision to Conclude Peace Treaty
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Not a few days have passed since the DPRK Foreign Ministry upon the authorization released a statement in which it courteously proposed to the parties to the Armistice Agreement an early start of the talks to replace the AA with a peace treaty this year marking the lapse of 60 years since the outbreak of the Korean war. But some forces are repeating their assertion that the DPRK should "dismantle its nukes first" and advertising the effectiveness of "sanctions" in a bid to play down the validity and significance of the realistic proposal of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This cannot be interpreted as the remarks made by those who truly wish for peace, stability and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty is a reasonable way for comprehensively and fully implementing the September 19 Joint Statement.
					
					 If the joint statement is to be implemented, the spirit of mutual respect and equality, a vital element of the statement, should not be defiled and, at the same time, such thing as the misrepresentation of the order of action should not be allowed. The above-said proposal of the DPRK represents the most correct option for settling the issues of peace and denuclearization of the peninsula.
					
					 It is the purport of the DPRK's proposal to put an end to the vicious cycle of distrust and build confidence with a view to pushing ahead with denuclearization.  It is beyond any doubt that there will be a starting point of confidence building if the parties to the AA properly understand the purport of the DPRK's proposal and come out and sit at the negotiating table for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 If a peace treaty is concluded through negotiations, confidence will be built between the DPRK and the U.S. to put an end to the hostile relations and give a strong impetus to the denuclearization of the peninsula.
					
					 Those parties concerned would be well advised to judge the hardcore and fundamental issue with reason and make a bold decision to respond to the above-mentioned just and realistic proposal of the DPRK without delay.

articles.title: Struggle for Peace against War Called for
articles.content:
Struggle for Peace against War Called for
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A war can be averted and the people's desire for peace realized only through a staunch struggle against the imperialists' policy of war. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the aspiration and desire common to mankind to live in a peaceful world without war.
					
					 Peace can be achieved only through a struggle. The struggle for preserving peace precisely means an anti-imperialist and anti-war struggle.
					
					 In order to avert a war and ensure peace the world progressive people should go united to frustrate every move of the imperialists for aggression and war and tightly bind them hand and foot.
					
					 The higher the peace-loving people hold the banner of unity, the bitterer frustration the imperialists will meet in their moves for aggression and war and the more favorable environment will be created for the accomplishment of the human cause of peace.
					
					 The imperialists will not be able to dare run wild and launch a war of aggression if all the peace-loving countries and people in the world boost their capabilities for self-defence.
					
					 The imperialist aggressor forces are now in a serious crisis internally and externally.
					
					 The anti-imperialist independent forces should properly understand the weakness of the imperialist forces for aggression and positively turn out in the struggle to protect peace from war, remaining unfazed by their bluffing.
					
					 As the imperialists are now working hard to put the world under their control and domination, peace can be lasting only when it is ensured worldwide. 
					
					 The preservation of peace on the Korean Peninsula constitutes a main link in the chain efforts for ensuring global peace. 
					
					 The Korean people have waged a strenuous struggle to avert a war and maintain peace in the peninsula under the uplifted banner of peace throughout the period of carrying out revolution and construction.
					
					 They will carry on their dynamic struggle to frustrate the war policy of the imperialist forces for aggression in the future, too, and thus defend the sovereignty of the country and socialism and give strong impetus to the victorious advance of the human cause of peace.

articles.title: All People Called upon to Display Their Mental Power
articles.content:
All People Called upon to Display Their Mental Power
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- In order to glorify the significant year 2010 as a year of radical changes to be specially recorded in the history of the country it is necessary to conduct a widespread ideological campaign on all fronts for building a thriving nation to give fullest rein to the mental power of all the service personnel and people, urges Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial.
					 The Workers' Party of Korea unrolled a far-reaching plan and an operation for bringing about a landmark turn in the people's standard of living, giving an unprecedented momentum to the general offensive, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The on-going ideological campaign is an all-out offensive for remarkably increasing the speed of the advance for effecting a great surge with the might of the perfect unity of the leader and all the service personnel and people and a charge for giving fullest play to their mental power so that events adding luster to the era of Songun may take place one after another.
					
					 It is necessary to bring about more dramatic turns and realize a nobler ideal than last year while waging this year's general offensive for improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 All the people are called upon to intensify the drive for effecting a great surge aimed at improving the people's standard of living with the strong spirit of national dignity, the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude and the spirit of noble love for future and devoted service and thus strikingly demonstrate once again before the whole world the spirit and stamina of Kim Il Sung's nation which has nothing impossible.
					
					 The on-going general offensive is sure to triumph when all the people live and struggle as the brave, staunch and devoted vanguard in the advance for effecting a great surge. 
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the people to give fullest play to the indomitable mental power of 
						Kim Il Sung's nation in this year's general offensive and thus successfully translate into reality the plan and intention of the Party to bring about a radical turn in improving the people's standard of living.

articles.title: S. Korean Students to Take Lead in Struggle
articles.content:
S. Korean Students to Take Lead in Struggle
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement on January 26 ten years after the death of Kim Ryang Mu, permanent vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification.
					 Still ringing in our ears is the ardent call for independent reunification made by martyr Kim Ryang Mu, the statement said, adding all the Koreans desirous of independent reunification, peace and prosperity have waged a dynamic struggle regarding the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as a lifeline of the nation and a great program of the country's reunification. 
					
					 It is impossible to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation nor is it possible to realize democratization of the society unless the dictatorial regime is toppled down, the statement stressed. It declared that the south Korean youth and students would take the lead in the struggle to achieve independent reunification through the implementation of the above-said declarations by carrying forward the spirit displayed by the martyr.

articles.title: DPRK FM Statement Supported in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK FM Statement Supported in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK issued a statement on Jan. 20 in support of the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The statement voiced invariable support for the political line of the DPRK government for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Calling for concluding a peace treaty aimed at terminating the state of war, the root cause of hostile relations, to begin with, in order to build confidence between the DPRK and the U.S., the statement said that the conclusion of a peace treaty is essential for durable peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and confidence between the two sides.
					
					 The statement pressed for the lifting of the unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK as they lay an obstacle in the way of ensuring peace and security on the peninsula.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported in DR Congo
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Supported in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic Republic of Congo sent a message to the DPRK embassy in Kinshasa on January 20 in support of the joint editorial of the DPRK's leading newspapers -- Rodong Sinmun, Josoninmingun and  Chongnyonjonwi -- titled "Bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea".
					 The message said that the Democratic Republic of Congo supports the DPRK's stand to put an end to the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. and establish a durable peace mechanism on the Korean Peninsula through dialogues and negotiations and thus realize reunification of the country as clarified in the joint editorial.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated in Italy and Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated in Italy and Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for celebrating February 16 was formed on Jan. 25 and a Bangladeshi preparatory committee for celebrating February 16 on Jan. 24.
					 Osvaldo Pesce, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Italy, and Mauro Cazadio, general secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy, were elected co-chairmen of the Italian preparatory committee and Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, was elected chairman of the Bangladeshi preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremonies.
					
					 The preparatory committees decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Embajador vietnamita ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Embajador vietnamita ofrece banquete
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, el embajador vietnamita en Corea, Le Van Cu, ofrecio el dia 28 un banquete. 
					Fueron invitados el canciller Pak Ui Chun, el viceministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Myong San, el vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Vietnam, Jon Yong Jin, y otros funcionarios coreanos. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros de la embajada vietnamita en Corea. 
					
					Le Van Cu senalo en su discurso que el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de su pais mantienen invariablemente la posicion de apreciar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo hermanos de Corea. 
					
					El partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Vietnam apoyan siempre los constantes esfuerzos de sus homologos de Corea por lograr la reunificacion pacifica del pais, afirmo y deseo al pueblo coreano mayores exitos en la lucha por construir la patria socialista prospera uniendose monoliticamente bajo la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por el Secretario General Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Pak Ui Chun ratifico que se esforzaria junto con los camaradas vietnamitas por fortalecer los lazos de amistad y cooperacion en todas las esferas de la politica, la economia y la cultura.
					
					Deseo al gobierno y el pueblo de Vietnam mayor progreso y prosperidad en la construccion socialista y en las labores para la paz y la estabilidad de la region.

articles.title: Conmemoran en Hanoi aniversario 60 de relaciones Corea-Vietnam
articles.content:
Conmemoran en Hanoi aniversario 60  de relaciones Corea-Vietnam
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 22 en el Museo Ho Chi Minh en Hanoi la exhibicion de fotos dedicada al 60o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre Corea y Vietnam. 
					En la ocasion se veian las fotos alusivas a las actividades exteriores que realizaron por separado el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il con el Presidente Ho Chi Minh y con el Secretario General Nong Duc Manh y las otras que muestran las imborrables hazanas del Dirigente acumuladas en su orientacion mediante el Songun. 
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural hubo discursos. 
					
					El director del Museo Ho Chi Minh dijo que desde el establecimiento el 31 de enero de 1950 de las relaciones diplomaticas entre Vietnam y Corea, las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises vinieron consolidandose y desarrollandose constantemente.
					
					Agrego que a traves de esta galeria de fotos, el pueblo vietnamita conocera bien la historia de desarrollo de las relaciones entre los dos paises y los exitos que el pueblo coreano logra en la defensa de la patria y en la construccion socialista. 
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que ese acto contribuira a consolidar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los partidos, los gobiernos y los pueblos de los dos paises.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe tomar decision de concertar convenio de paz
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe tomar decision de concertar convenio de paz
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ATCC) -- Ya pasaron no pocos dias desde cuando el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico bajo la autorizacion una declaracion fundamentada en la propuesta cortes a los paises responsables del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea de iniciar pronto el dialogo para sustituir este documento por el otro de paz en este ano del aniversario 60 del estallido de la pasada guerra coreana.
					Mientras tanto, algunos insisten reiteradamente en la "renuncia nuclear primero" con el fin de menguar la justeza y la importancia de nuestra propuesta realista y abogan por la validez de la "sancion". 
					
					Estos discursos no son de los que desean de veras la paz, la estabilidad y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido en su edicion de este viernes y continua:
					
					La propuesta de la RPDC de concertar el convenio de paz es el remedio racional para implementar general y totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre.
					
					Para este fin, no debe ser desvirtuado el espiritu de respeto mutuo y de igualdad, que resulta lo vital de esa declaracion conjunta, ni tergiversado el orden de acciones. 
					
					La iniciativa de la RPDC es la opcion mas justa para resolver el problema de paz y el nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					El proposito de ella es acabar con el circulo vicioso de desconfianza y acelerar la desnuclearizacion mediante la creacion de la confianza. 
					
					Indudablemente, el punto de partida de la confianza se dara simplemente cuando los paises responsables se sienten a la mesa de las negociaciones para firmar el convenio de paz tras entender bien tal proposito.
					
					La firma del convenio de paz mediante las negociaciones creara la confianza entre la RPDC y EE.UU. y eliminara las relaciones hostiles bilaterales, lo cual dara buen impulso al proceso de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Los paises interesados deben meditar con juicio el problema medular y fundamental y tomar la valiente decision de aceptar cuanto antes la justa y realista propuesta de la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a aumentar al maximo la potencia espiritual
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a aumentar al maximo la potencia espiritual
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ATCC) -- Para convertir este ano significativo en un ano de gran cambio, que se registre con letras mayusculas en la historia de la patria, es necesario manifestar al maximo la potencia espiritual de todo el ejercito y el pueblo al lanzar una intensa campana ideologica en todos los sectores de construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un editorial divulgado este viernes y continua:
					
					Ahora el Partido del Trabajo de Corea libra una dinamica ofensiva general sin precedente en la historia a fin de poner en practica su ambicioso proyecto de imprimir un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo.
					
					La campana ideologica de hoy deviene un gran combate ofensivo para aumentar extraordinariamente la velocidad de marcha de gran auge con el poderio de la union perfecta entre el lider y todo el ejercito y el pueblo y para registrar uno tras otro grandes eventos, que hagan brillar la epoca del Songun, al emplear sin reservas la potencia espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					En la ofensiva general de este ano por la mejora de la vida del pueblo es preciso propiciar los sucesos de mayor importancia y realizar los ideales mas altos en comparacion con el ano pasado.
					
					Todos deben promover con mas vigor el gran auge para el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo con la fuerte dignidad nacional, el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y de lucha tenaz y el de noble amor y abnegacion por el futuro y volver a exaltar a todo el mundo el temperamento y el impetu de la nacion de Kim Il Sung que no conoce lo imposible.
					
					Cuando todo el pueblo viva y luche como valiente, inflexible y abnegado vanguardia de la marcha de gran auge, sera definitiva la victoria de la ofensiva general de hoy.
					
					Todos deben materializar con brillantez el proyecto y el designio del partido de registrar un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo al emplear toda la indoblegable potencia espiritual de la nacion de
						 Kim Il Sung en la ofensiva general de este ano.
